content.detailedDescription: This is the second photo from the sighting i had on 2/11/12.
content.summary: 2nd photo of reported sighting on 2/11/12

content.detailedDescription:
Is there any information about a sighting in the kerrville, texas area near the airport one morning in 1968-1971?  i witnessed these flying objects when i was in my early teens, but i cannot remember exactly what day, month or year, and i had no idea how to report it at the time.  i have reason to believe it was seen by others, also.

my house was on the side of a hill facing south.  the airport was beyond another range of hills to the south.  i was standing outside my front door waiting for my mother to take me to school.  before she came out of the house, at approximately 8 am, i heard a multi-engine airplane very close.  i looked out across the valley and the plane was coming directly toward me, slightly below my level in the valley.  the engines seemed to be screaming at full throttle and as it rose to clear my house and the hill where i was standing, it appeared to be pursued by 2 bullet-shaped objects.  they changed position in relation to the airplane as they zoomed overhead:  one came from behind to above the plane, the other came from one side of the plane to in front, as if leading it.  they disappeared above and behind me over the top of the hill.

the objects were about 20 feet long, flat gray in color, with flat orange tip and flat orange band around the back end.  there were markings in black on the side, but no symbols i recognized.  there were no fins or control surfaces visible, and if they made any sound, it was drowned out by the whine/roar of the plane engines.  the plane appeared to be a cargo plane of some sort, and i believe it had 4 engines, was silver-gray and approximately 50 - 60 ft long.
content.summary: 2 bullet-shaped objects chasing a multi-engine propeller airplane

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30 pm on 2/4/12, i noticed a bright orange light low in the sky.  there was a low and thin cloud cover that night so i couldn't make out any details.  i though nothing of it until i noticed another.  the obejects seemed low and slow mooving without making any sound.  i got y wife and we witnessed another 3 orbs pass by in the same flight direction. the light emitted byt the orbs was staedy as was their flight path.  they disappered into the sky on their steady path
content.summary: Seemed like they were orange orbs.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv as i noticed a commercial of a clown majic act. he was showing a bottle of pinesol with a wand and how stains dissapeared majically. after seeing this i went across the street and bought some fabrisolv, and polished my computer. i remember needing something from my purse as i noticed that my wallet was not there. i recall thinking that maybe my wallet had telaported somewhere after using the fabrisolv two weeeks later i recieved a fedex as the package had indeed my returned wallet. the return address was from the store, bath and beyond. i knew i did not shop there, so how did this happen? maybe my walllet teleported to a ufo they may have. all my credit cards were there, even my laundry card was there, and only some cash under $20 was missing...Unfortunatly my expensive alienware computer stopped working after using this fluid cleaner. my disc drive compleatly no longer reconized its own hardware.
content.summary: Telaport

content.detailedDescription:
Bell rock, courthouse butte and lee mountain sit outside our patio. that is our view 254/7. (unless fog) this day was clear and beautiful out. i was sitting in dining room working on the computer on a sat/sun. in my left periphial, i saw what i thought was a white flying bug about to get into my eye. then i determined it was in the arizona room and continued to focus on my work without checking. something made me look up and a second later, i turned to look again and this little whitish thing was flying outside between the slats of the horizontal wooden blinds. 
i got up and went out to the patio and realized it was a humonoid figure without a powerpack of any sort and it flew from the left (from my perspective) from the far left of lee mountain and between, courthouse and even more pointedly, between what is known as ufo rock and lee mountain. ufo rock is to the right of llama trail if you are looking at lee mountain from the trail perspective. 
my bf's mom came out and she asked what i was looking at, she saw it too, but (i don't know if she would come out and state that she did) it moved very intended without sways, dips. it did not descend or ascend, very horizontal path and went into the mountain side... just before the rock formation known as rabbit ears. it may have had sound, but from where we were outside, no sound and it looked very humanoid without a powerpack.
i thought it was cool, cause i am pretty open to the possibility of what there is for us to learn about other life forms within our earth or outer space. i didn't tell a whole lot of people, as my bf's family at the time were very private.
content.summary: Off white humanoid flew from where lee mtn starts and btwn lee mt & crthse and into lee mtn

content.detailedDescription: I bought a off brand tablet pc around christmas. i was messing with it on this day and walked outside to film my dogs running in the yard. this was the very first time i recorded anything on this tablet. as i filmed the dogs i was walking in the yard. i seen the neighbor and his dogs in his yard and said hi to him and he walked over to the fence,as we stopped to talk i just held the tablet in my hand. when i cam in the house to look at the recording i seen this object go by in the sky. i was not in the house 15 seconds and went back outside and looked in the sky thinking it was a balloon floating by. there was no balloon. so i thought i'd send it to you guys to look at.
content.summary: Object in sky while filming

content.detailedDescription:
i was watching h2 on tv last night and they were talking about area 51, so i brought up google earth and moved to the area and started looking around, and as i was going east on groom lake road i saw an anomaly. there was a shadow on the ground that didn't look right, so i zoomed in and saw what looks like a lifting body that i measured against an f-16 that is parked in area 51 and measure it to be over 300 feet wide. the shadow is only about 1/3 of the aircraft as the bottom of it is cut off by another satellite photo. 
 the google earth latitude and longitude are: 37'23'48.85n 115'278'02.48 w elev 4381. anybody can look it up on google earth, just south of groom lake road.
 if the original satellite photo was aquired, it might show the whole shadow and as most of the google earth photos i have seen are taken from the southeast to the northwest, if the original photo goes far enough south you may even get a picture of the aircraft that made the shadow.
content.summary: Picture of a shadow of a lifting body over 300 feet wide.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was closing the front door after coming home from work, i noticed a bright orange light in the sky, it looked quite a long way away but was very bright. i've seen plenty of helicopters and planes flying over crossflatts park over the years and even satellites being moved and this thing was nothing like anything i have ever seen before.

looking towards leeds it moved slowly from left to right, i watched it for a few minutes and then ran upstairs for a better view from the attic and grabbed my hd video recording camera. even on 16x optical zoom it was still quite a distance away because on maximum zoom it was still just a bright spherical object.

it was a very pale orange colour and appeared to slowly shift colour from fleshy pink to pale orange. it made no sound at all, when ive watched police helicopters searching for people from a distance you can at least hear their engines echoing while theyre in the air.

the object was moving in the opposite direction that incoming planes use when they're coming in to land at the leeds and bradford airport. the strangest thing was that it would sporadically stop dead in the sky and then carry on moving. and at one point it was to the east in the direction of crossflatts park then dissapeared and reappeared nne in the direction of leeds city center, so there were either two of them that flew identical paths in the sky or the same thing that moved very fast in the blink of an eye. when looking carefully at the recorded video i was able to save individual frames and zoom in on the object. on closer inspection it appeared to be be sphere with small bumps clustered around it. either clustered bumps or a sphere with lights of various intensity on it, making it look like it was clustered with smaller objects. and it also looked like a ball of fire because you can make out what looks to be sparks or flames licking off of it.

the most bizzare thing is that i didnt just lose it from focus, on closer inspection of the video on the pc, the object actually skips through the sky a short distance then quickly does a u-turn and dissapears at an alarming rate in the opposite direction. a second or so after it leaves, there is a faint noise almost like the crack of a sonic boom. i have seen iridium flares, chinese lanterns, search helicopters and plenty of planes over the years but none of them looked like what i recorded.

(i have uploaded the original large mts file that my camera generated. without converting it, the only media player that i can watch it with is vlc media player. hopefully you will be able to take a closer look at the object and perhaps enhance the video. fortunately it was a very clear night with only the moon out.)
content.summary: I observed a slow moving bright ball of fire, recorded it moving for a few minutes, it moved then stopped and skipped across sky and sped off at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I stopped my car to view these hovering orange orbs. at first there were 3 and then a final floating orange orb appeared after the others had faded away. i even pulled out my iphone and filmed this event. unfortuatnely, the iphone did not record anything despite that it was definitely flashing the red "recording" button.  next, i called a friend in the area and he confirmed the sighting.  these were very bright orange orbs moved very casually southward about a mile above. after floating for about 3 minutes the first 3 disappeared and another appeared. the final orb continued floating for about 2 minutes before it stopped glowing orange. i could distinguish a faint object where the glowing orange orb had been. this tiny dot of a thing floated for a little longer before becoming difficult to see.
content.summary: Hovering orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: It was the middle of the night and i was sitting on the balcony at my apartment complex when i saw what looked like a flying saucer flying along the top of the mountain in jacksonville. i noticed it because it was moving very fast and barely clearing the treetops. it made no noise at all also. it moved so swiftly through the sky flying north. as quickly as it was there it was gone, never changing direction. after it passed, i saw the light from the ranger tower on top of the mountain come on. the light was moving as if the controller of the light was severely spooked. i was spooked myself i had chill bumps and couldnt stop shaking.
content.summary: Flying saucer looking craft flying along the crest of the mountain.

content.detailedDescription: Just got on highway 14 out of downtown vancouver at about 10:45-10:50. i see in the distance on the eastern horizon just north of mount hood the top 20% of an orange glowing orb which at the time looked like a comet with an a arced tail. i quickly pulled off of highway 14 and turned into the parking lot at beaches restaurant an ran out to the walking path on the waterfront of the columbia river. the orb was out of my sight for about 2 full minutes. when i saw it again i could now only see the bottom 30-35% of the orb as it was rapidly ascending into the sky. from that point it was only 30 seconds before the whole thing disapeared as if behind a curtin. it was a mostly cloudless night and there were the ever present airplanes landing at the portland airport across the river. i thought it must have been the moon at first but the orb raised into the sky and disapeared much quicker than the moon ever moves. it was in the same part of the sky as mount hood as seen from vancouver or portland. i am sure any news weather cam that was trained on mount hood at the time would have caught it. i was able to snap two pictures of the orb in the sky from the walkway directly behind beaches restaurant. the orb can be seen as a semi circle in the pictures not to be confused with the two full circles of light in the pictures which are lights on the restaurant. i have lived in vancouver, wa. my whole life and i have seen thousands of aircraft land at pdx. i have witnessed many things in the sky here including a chinese kite with flashing led lights directly over my neighborhood that has been reported to mufon as a ufo. but from the moment i first saw it i was sure that this was unlike anything i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Large orb seen ascending just north of mount hood as seen from vancouver.

content.detailedDescription: Went out with dogs before going to bed and saw the lights.  coyotes went crazy in distance and my two dogs got very excited.  lights pulsated continuously.  called neighbors to confirm.
content.summary: Pulsating lights that displayed for several minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving the cracker barrel restaurant with my mom, step dad, friend and friends son in my step dads truck, my mom hit me and said look over there. i look to where she was pointing and spotted a perfectly spherical shaped  craft with a highly reflective surface. it look to be between two and two half miles away from are position. we were driving down  heimos industrial park drive looking west. the object was hovering between meramec bottom road and lemay ferry. we watched the object hover for about 1 minute and right as the object started to move down, we past in front of a building high enough to block are view. as soon as we past by the building the object was gone and no where to be seen. we stopped the vehicle stepped out and took a look around in hopes to see it and get a picture or video but was unsuccessful. 
for what i could tell was this object was quiet large do to the fact how big it looked for the distance it was from are location. also could tell it was no balloon or air craft. it was way to round and a smooth surface that reflected the sun very well. also a balloon or air craft would not move down and then just disappear in just a few seconds time. i know others in the area have had to seen this object. it was a very clear, sunny, cold day without a cloud in the sky. any object in the sky this reflective would catch anyone's eye.
content.summary: Perfectly sphere shaped solid object with highly reflective metal surface

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on the south end of boca grande island when i saw what looked like a shooting star stop in the sky. it showed four lights once and then not again.I made a few assuming thoughts in my head thinking it was talking to me and continued driving. almost the time i made it to the only bridge off the island, the object appeared again in my 3 oclock position. as i was looking out the passenger side of my vehicle i felt as if it was communicating with me. i kept driving and the object, having four lights in the distance, began to appear as what seemed to be a comet heading right towards the road. i was afraid that it was going to cause an explosion and veered off the road. at this time the object looked as if it fell into the water. there were very small waves, like i threw a rock, but not much larger, and i thought "wow" it was trying to scare me. it did.
content.summary: Saw object with four lights dash across the sky. driving home from work saw same object trail my vehicle while seeming to hover. in a dash the object fell like a shooting star and went into the water like it was absorbed. i thought it was a comet

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in a parking lot talking with some friends. the sun had just set and the sky was lit up with the remaining rays of light in the sky. i see light in the corner of my eye and the natural reaction is to look up. so i did, when i looked up i noticed that it was three distinct lights moving in a triangular patter at a constant speed. i kept my eyes on it, pointed to it and said out loud, " dude, what is that?!" to my three friends. they looked and as they tried to focus in the direction i was looking, the lights started to fade out and none of them saw it. the object was about 500-900 ft above me. my first thought was that it was a weird plane that we have seen in the area in the past that has regular wings and also a set of small wings on the nose. it took me about 1 second to realize that it was not this plane i had become accustomed to seeing because it was so unlike anything that flies in american airspace. the lights were in a triangular formation and the "craft" between the lights was barley 1 shade darker than the sky above it. maybe some sort of cloaking camouflage? thats the only thing i can think of.
it really shook me. i couldn't calm down for an hour.


i later found out that one night before my sighting, my friend had seen the same thing and it really scared him. we are both normal, sane guys. we are outdoorsmen and trust our eyes. the people we associate with also trust what we see. we don't tell tales or lie when it comes to stuff like this or anything else in our daily life.

also, two nights after my sighting the same guy and his friend saw the lights again.

listen. it is not a plane. it is not a helicopter, blimp, balloon, r/c toy. it is an extremely large craft that moves silently and in almost complete camouflage.
content.summary: 3 lights in a triangular pattern flew over my head at a decently high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Please watch the video and ask questions.
this site is too detailed...
content.summary: I've seen this thing numerous times and in the similar area / time

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:30 p.M. 2-11-12 driving north on creyts road in lansing, looked west out my drivers window observed a bright amber colored orange orb-like object ascending at about 45��� angle then moving east.  i stopped my car on the side of the road and watched it for a few minutes thinking it was a chinese lantern.  it moved steadily across the sky headed east directly behind me.  i realized it was too big to be a chinese lantern.  i noticed no blinking lights or noise.  cars were passing by me headed south so i  know they must have seen the object as well.  i got out of my car and took two pictures.  i've got two pictures, but am only able to download one at this time as my battery on my phone is dead and i don't have my charger.
content.summary: Orange orb-like, brightly glowing light from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Hi here are three classic selected white orb shots over whittier, california in february.  i selected these from some 200+ i have acquired whlie taking hundreds of pictures of chemtrails. 
  mufons new site layout is real nice. i can show you three sequential pictures with a chemtrai to give you bearings.  . all three pictures, and i have more from this shoot. were shot in the same minute, timed by j-peg # and date.  the one white orb up high, is crystal clear, appears to look like a moon! the others decend or are moving. in an arc path.  of many similar groups shots i have. i thouht these would look nice and clear. thanks, guy from whiitier....Keep looking at the sky! you will see someting!
content.summary: Selected sequential orb shots three decending very clear!

content.detailedDescription: I was looking into the ksy and asked a start looking objetbject local address suing my mind. next thing i knew there was a huge beam of light that flashed over my head. the sound that projected from this star was none other ive experienced on earth. my brain felt like it was being chopped from my skull and for the next two hours i felt my head would lside from my brain. this is powerful alien technology that humans do not have access to here on earth. i also have had numerous alien encounters and not sure whom to speak to about any of this. i would even be willing to take a lie detector in order to confirm what i have seen. i am know to have a picture perfect memory ande alos have information that is pertinent to the survival of our race.  any correspondence regarding these issues is highly appreciated.
content.summary: I communicated with a star in the sky which then emmited a beam abovemy head approxiamtely 4- 5 feet above my head

content.detailedDescription:
They appeared as little old man when i was 7. then showed me a sick body down in the bed. they told me this incarnation would be rough and gave me an option, saying they would protect me from all ills. if i would not despair and commit suicide, and live the life, i would attain a great status. what that is/was, i have no idea, but i opted to stay in the body. i put up with my parents drinking, fighting, various illnesses-scarlet fever, etc. at death's doorstep within leukemia, but they had promised me help, and i had full faith in them.I had my only son at age 40 and suffered renal failure a year after. they saw me thru' this with 6 litho-tripsies, two episodes of pneumonia, etc. in '79 while living here with mother, they spoke into my 3rd eye:" awake! awake! we are mad at you!" i took this to mean i needed to take a special mate to pass on a very special genetic code, one passed on from my father to me by "the aliens", but it frightened him to near death! i did leave, found my mate, and we had our son! before i left ark i was visited by them...Without seeing them, but hearing odd synthenic sounds, was paralyzed, lifted from my bed, taken in full body up thru' the roof and through a spectrum of black with incredibly fast speed thru' what i can only describe as stars. then, a blackout! some "protector", at my left...I begged to return. he (he?) re-turned me, and i could feel my head touch my pillow. were they strenghtening me for my journey from ark to pa ? i trusted them implicitly! in '92 i had the chance to see four of them coming thru' my window! i slept midroom while husband slept front room! i still have this 11x12 inch rendering. i am sorry to have skipped around so. these are not bad experiences borne of horror! i beg for you to know this!!
i am a woman of 65, and think of nothing other than kindness from my "little old man". after all, they came to me at age 7! if it were all a dream, would i have recalled it all these decades? how many amoung you can have vivid recall of a dream that visited you at age seven? my best to all! protect the planet,take care of the young, and plant trees!!!!P.S. my only sketch '92 "strangers in the night" will not reproduce. this is not a joke.
content.summary: First happened when i was 7; then on regular basis most of my life.In different forms. mostly experiences are positive and rewarding!

content.detailedDescription:
Mystery objects
my wife and i were personally invited to visit someone���s home in fletcher, nc outside asheville by north carolinas��� public relations director israel curiel. 
the witness has been seeing lights in the sky around the house for two weeks and the last four consecutive nights in the same general location.
on our arrival we were met by our host, who suddenly told us to turn round where we witnessed a bright star like object, approximately 20,000 feet up behaving in random movements and displaying colours. she said this ufo will be here for awhile, so we were escorted to the rear of the house where we witnessed another star like object, same as the one in front behaving in a similar pattern. we did not find this unusual looking in the sky at this time, she said "wait" things will change.
 
there was significant cloud cover which hindered our ability to see anything, but on occasion the cloud cover would break up giving us access to the object. 

shortly the ufo sent what appeared to be sparkles and falling downward, this was witnessed by three of us this was a familiar activity that has been seen by previous sightings by us.
the witness said she had a video taken by a digital camera of the same objects; it was clearly visible off the same type object. as you watched the video, there were two smaller objects dancing around the larger object and changing colours. 
to our surprise, they formed a pattern of a disc shaped object with secondary colours were surrounding it as it was manoeuvring. although the cloud continued our host pointed to the locations where she would normally see them.
during our time there, we heard a military jet screaming overhead.

overall they were six witnesses that evening and we all saw these objects  

our host should ius where she often seee them, i took several photos during that night where the sky was opening up, i had captured some anomalies. photos were taken on a canon rebel t3 with 30 second exposure time.
i want to thank our host for inviting us into their home and israel for this amazing experience, who also brought with him his father and brother.
content.summary: Sky watch at asheville

content.detailedDescription: I was with a group of friends at cold stone (ice cream restaurant). we had just left the restaurant and were standing in a circle talking in the parking lot. i was facing southeast when i was the first to notice the object in the sky. at first glance it just appeared to be a shooting star but it was moving very slowly and then it clearly changed directions. i told everyone to turn around (there were 4 of us total). we watched the object for a few seconds when we noticed that a second object had appeared below the first. they were both "drifting" back an forth.At this point i pulled my iphone out and frantically began trying to film them. when i started filming a third object appeared (as can be seen in the video i uploaded). the video makes it hard to see, but all three of the objects had a short tail and were slowly drifting or "dancing" back and forth. i was freaking out and inadvertently drawing a lot of attention (as can be heard in my video). there were other witnesses in the parking lot, a couple of ladies are seen asking us what they were in the video. before i started filming, another group of people wrote off the objects as being, "just meteors". the objects clearly were not meteors. they disappeared one at a time and just seemed to burn out or fade away. roughly 3 minutes after the incident there was a fireworks show about 30 degrees west and much much lower to the ground than the lights had appeared. i do not think the sightings were related to the fireworks, they lasted too long and did not behave like any fireworks i have ever seen, they were also long gone by the time the fireworks started and were in the completely wrong part of the sky. roughly 10-15 minutes after the event, i was driving due north when a row of 3 fighter jets flew straight past me heading in the exact direction that the lights had been seen. we were relatively close to luke air force base, but jets rarely fly directly over the city, and they were low and fast. at the same time as the jets flew past me, a helicopter flew directly overhead going northwest (not toward the event). i do not think the helicopter was related to the event, but i have suspicions that the jets might be.
content.summary: Saw three "meteor like" objects that fluidly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed a bright reddish light approach us from the north west on the evening of feb 10,2102 at approximately 7:45 pm. it hovered for a few minutes and then rapidly accelerate to the north. no emissions, or appendages were observed.
2 photos and a sketch are included. the photos were taken using a 5x telephoto canon digital camera. the sketch was as it appeared to me through
binoculars.
content.summary: Wife and i observed reddish light move toward us from the nw, hover for a few minutes and then retreat rapidly to the north

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of the movies with my wife, and on the way home i saw one very bright light not moving. first i thought it was an airplane but something was not right. then it move quick to the north which is strange because most planes move south to land at airport. after that saw 3-4 helios. in formation going after it then in a search pattern after 5 mins.
content.summary: Get out of movie, heading home saw a bright white light followed by 3 helio, then they began search pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Has anyone seen the perfect x in the sky on feb 9th 2012, with a bright light in the middle of the x. this was so large that my daughter seen it also 86 miles away, it was to perfect to be a cloud
content.summary: There was a perfect cloud shaped like the letter x very large and bright, with a bright light in the middle. was driving on kings hwy around 10:30 pm on feb 9th 2012 with my sister.  called my daughter who lives 86miles away she seen it to

content.detailedDescription: Came home and let my dogs out on he back porch and step out in the grass for he puppy and was waiting on her to use restroom.I always look at the sky and was looking around and notice the star moving from he west. as i started to pay more attention i could tell that it was very low in the sky and very bright it was a solid white with not flashing plane lights or no twinkle like a regular star.It moved very slow right over me and i noticed as it was right above me i could tell that i kind of swayed as it moved in its path. as it went more towards the east it then went up and at a 45 degree angle at what i would have to say at a fast unnoticable speed if that makes since meaning you could tell it went out of the atmosphere quicky but not like a blink of an eye speed nor was it very slow to leave it was just like you could tell it was quicker than the way it was traveling from east to west.I was amazing.
content.summary: Bright low moving star that went from west to east then at a fast rate of speed went up at a 45 degree angle out of he atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: My grnadma was driving me too basketball practice when high in the sky i saw this trianguler object. me and my mom have saw this object on thanksgiving of 2011. it looked the same as the ones seen over belguim 1989-1990.It disrupted both of our cell phones it seemed to hover then go for a while and then i took my eye of the object for a second then it was gone. my grandma has bad eyesight so lost it after a while. a havent seen it since but expect to soon
content.summary: It was trianguler with white lights and a blinking red light in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
December 25th, 2011, around 10:30 pm, i was driving home, heading down woodbury/glassboro road, about to turn right onto rt. 47 (delsea dr.)  my wife said "oh my god, what is that?"  then i looked up and seen about 10 orbs floating in a formation across the sky. i briefly slowed down to observe them, but then quickly turned into the nearest parking lot and jumped out of the vehicle.  i took a few photos and a couple short videos with my wifes digital camera.  there were numerous cars pulled over along the road observing the event as well, then another car stopped next to us and were asking "what's going on?" 
the red glowing orbs appeared to be floating in a formation type pattern, then they began to disappear a few at a time, leaving some behind, then they disappeared as well.  they seemed to either fly away, or just turn invisible...Was hard to tell. many of the orbs turned away and disappeared very quickly, so i only captured a couple objects on video.  the pictures i have on the other hand are quite interesting.  a few other objects appeared after i uploaded the photos and zoomed in closely, these we did not see during the event.  we have not disclosed these photos or videos to anyone but close family and friends, and after numerous people said we should contact someone...Well, here we are.  hope to hear from you soon, i would love to get the photos looked at by a professional, so we can be certain what is on there.  give thanks for your time and consideration.

j.A.G.
content.summary: Driving home christmas night, my wife and i saw numerous orbs of light in the sky
